mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users( id, uuid, phone, password, firstname, lastname, nickname, type, status, created_time, modified_time, pic_url, wonderful_time, easemob_uuid, phone_type, access_token, login_time, user_code, identity_num, current_type, current_uuid, yunhteacherid, yunhteachercode ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wonderfulTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{easemobUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneType, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{accessToken, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currentType, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{currentUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yunhteacherid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yunhteachercode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM users WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}

DELETE FROM users WHERE id in
#{item, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id id, a.uuid uuid, a.phone phone, a.password password, a.firstname firstname, a.lastname lastname, a.nickname nickname, a.type type, a.status status, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createdTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.modified_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') modifiedTime, a.pic_url picUrl, DATE_FORMAT(a.wonderful_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') wonderfulTime, a.easemob_uuid easemobUuid, a.phone_type phoneType, a.access_token accessToken, DATE_FORMAT(a.login_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') loginTime, a.user_code userCode, a.identity_num identityNum, a.current_type currentType, a.current_uuid currentUuid, a.yunhteacherid yunhteacherid, a.yunhteachercode yunhteachercode FROM users a WHERE a.id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT a.id id, a.uuid uuid, a.phone phone, a.password password, a.firstname firstname, a.lastname lastname, a.nickname nickname, a.type type, a.status status, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createdTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.modified_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') modifiedTime, a.pic_url picUrl, DATE_FORMAT(a.wonderful_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') wonderfulTime, a.easemob_uuid easemobUuid, a.phone_type phoneType, a.access_token accessToken, DATE_FORMAT(a.login_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') loginTime, a.user_code userCode, a.identity_num identityNum, a.current_type currentType, a.current_uuid currentUuid, a.yunhteacherid yunhteacherid, a.yunhteachercode yunhteachercode FROM users a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.id ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM users a WHERE 1=1
